title: Episode 219: Abortion Access and Reproductive Justice with Jessica Pinckney
itunes:title: Episode 219: Abortion Access and Reproductive Justice with Jessica Pinckney
description:
Doree and Kate announce their Giving Circle with the States Project, and Kate reports on some isolation prods she enjoys. Then, Executive Director of Access Reproductive Justice Jessica Pinckney joins them to discuss reproductive justice and abortion access, what’s happening to them right now, and how we can help. Plus, they chat about why romance novels are part of Jessica’s self-care and why she wants you to say the word “abortion” more.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
